name: Sean Carawan
desc: Sean is a rising junior at Dulles. As the club founder and president, Sean is the reason why this club exists, and is excited to share his passion for neuroscience.

name: Musir Merani
desc: Musir is a rising junior at Dulles. As the Vice President of Education, he works with Sean to create an efficient curriculum designed to teach students about neuroscience.

name: Ritvik Mangire
desc: Ritvik is a rising Junior at Dulles. Ritvik works a vital part of this club as he foresees all club operations & finances.
